document.docAuthor: Wiesner, Jürgen, Bandinelli, Aligi & Matalin, Andrey
document.masterDocTitle: Notes on the tiger beetles (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Cicindelinae) of Vietnam. 135. Contribution towards the knowledge of Cicindelinae

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Notes on the tiger beetles (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Cicindelinae) of Vietnam. 135. Contribution towards the knowledge of Cicindelinae

subSubSection.paragraph:

Distribution. Vietnam ( Ha Giang , Ha Noi City, Hoa Binh , Lang Son , Lao Cai , Ninh Binh , Phu Tho , Quang Binh , Thai Nguyen , Thanh Hoa , Thua Thien-Hue , Tuyen Quang , Vinh Phuc ), Laos ( Borikhamxay ).
Remarks. New provincial records for Ha Giang , Ha Noi City, Hoa Binh , Lao Cai , Ninh Binh , Phu Tho , Quang Binh , Thai Nguyen , Thanh Hoa , Thua Thien-Hue , Tuyen Quang and Vinh Phuc .
